publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2896 Ross Finnie: The Draft Loch Lomond and the Trossachs National Park Designation, Transitional and Consequential Provisions (Scotland) Order 2002-That the Rural Development Committee, in consideration of the draft Loch Lomond and the Trossachs National Park Designation, Transitional and Consequential Provisions (Scotland) Order 2002, recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*
